item.title: Inquiry Proposal Form
item.description: Due on November 8, 2019 (9 a.m.). Must receive teacher approval of this completed form before conducting research.

item.title: Proposal Presentation Slides
item.description: Please submit your proposal presentation slides on October 29, 2019 (9 a.m.) in preparation for your prospoal presentions on October 30 or November 1.
